channel.title: SFoL 24: Casino - Signs ups open (13/16)
channel.description:
## Welcome to SFoL 24, Casino
## Hosted by Braixen
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay * Days will be 4 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies * Nights will be 2 IRL days long * Actions are done by messaging me * House will talk through a special Discord server * Cards at bottom of page * When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions * To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" * When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me * Executions end the Day * Trials pause the counter * Players may place bets on a player and if the player that was executed was evil, they get double their money.
### Special Info
* House has a limit of 4 memebers at a time * After 2 days of debt, you die * FAQ will be allowed and will be posted in this area
### Cards [details="House"] > ## [color=#2fec0e]The Dealer[/color] > **House Chaos** > - Cheat (day): Cheat your next game of poker instantly winning it (2 uses) > > - Passive: On the house: You are immune to loosing money at night. > > - Passive: CORE GAME MECHANIC: Immune to death > > - Night: Blackjack, play a game of blackjack with a player making them wager 5 coins (win double) > > - Night Poker: Play a game of poker with a player making them wager 5 coins (win double)
> ## [color=#2fec0e]The Bartender[/color] > **Male House Killer** > - Passive skilled in the arts: Immune to occupation > > - Passive: On the house, immune to loosing money. > > - Free liquor (Day) Target a player making them play 2 casino games for that night (3 uses) > > - Poisoned Drink: Give a poisoned drink to someone killing them in 2 nights (3 uses)
> ## [color=#2fec0e]The Operator[/color] > **House Chaos** > - Passive: On the house : Immune to loosing money > > - Passive: CORE GAME MECHANIC: Immune to death > > - Night: Low imployment: Employ people at the casino that have no money (2 uses targets all). > > - Night: Cheap trick: Make a player loose 3 coins (2 uses)
> ## [color=#2fec0e]Waitress[/color] > **Female House Support** > - Passive on the house: Immune to loosing money. > > - Passive Hot: Your hot, so you are not able to be targeted by negative abilities since men are so nice > > - Day: Cocktails: Serve players cocktails making them be occupied the next night > > - Night: Seduce: Seduce a player making you learn their class (2 uses) > > - Night: Pay the bill: Cash earned from gambling this night will be halfed (2 uses)
> ## [color=#2fec0e]House Scientist[/color] > **House Loyal** > - Passive: On the House: Immune to loosing money > > - Day: Concoction: Use a lethal poison to kill a player in 1 night and it is invisible (1 use) > > - Night: Experiment: Use your scientific abilities to experiment on a person > If you target Darby you will instantly die > Effects: > > 1/6- Gamblers will have their goal changed to support the evils > 1/6 - Gamblers will become drunk and randomly target people at night for 2 nights > 1/6 - The person will know who the Dealer is > 1/6 - The person will be brainwashed and do what you say for a night > 1/6 - The player will know who the operator is > 1/6 - The Player will randomly get another class from the gamblers [/details] [details="Gamblers"] > ## [color=#1a88ba]Counterfeiter[/color] > **Female Gambler Investigator** > - Passive: fake coins: Starts with 20 fake coins > > - Day: Money printer: Gain 5 more counterfeit coins (2 uses) > > - Night: Trackers: See who has your counterfeit coins (4 uses)
> ## [color=#1a88ba]The Beggar[/color] > **Male Gambler Support** > - Passive: low on cash: Has 5 coins > > - Day: Beg: Beg a player for 5 coins (4 uses) > > - Night: Stake out: Stake out the casino seeing who takes late night visits (3 uses)
> ## [color=#1a88ba]The Security[/color] > **Male Gambler Killer** > > - Passive: Big boy: Immune to being attacked > > - Day: Watch: Watch a player to see if they use their night ability (2 uses) > > - Night: Guard : Guard a player, dieing in their place and killing their attacker if they are attacked > > - Night Detain: Throw a person out of the casino (killing them same as cs.).
> ## [color=#1a88ba]The Card Counter[/color] > **Male Counter** > > Passive: Card counting: When gambling you will know the cards your opponents have. > > Day: Sketch: Know all the cards in the deck and their order. (3 uses). > > Night: “Gamble”: Gamble with a player 1/6 chance of being caught cheating
> ## [color=#1a88ba]The Informant[/color] > **Female Gambler Investigator** > > - Passive: Close eye: No one can cheat on you > > - Day: Profile: Check the profile of a player, you will know their balance (House has 10 coins). (2 uses) > > - Night: Interrogate: Interrogate a player
> ## [color=#1a88ba]High Roller [/color] > - Passive: Moneyaholic: You got lots of money (100 coins) > > - Passive: Kingman: Votes count as 2 > > - Day: Dice roll: Pick 6 players and have them play Texas holdem (random) > > - Night: Well secure: Have a guard guard you (5 uses) > > - Night: Hired assassin: Hire a assassin to kill a player (2 uses)
> ## [color=#1a88ba]Fresh Meat[/color] > **Male Gambler Investigator** > > - Passive: New to this: Start with 15 coins > > - Day: Explain: Have a person explain the rules to you, if they know the rules then they have not cheated in the past 3 nights. (3 uses) > > - Night: Slot Machine: Spin the slot machine for 1 coin, the panels are all the people in the game and some extras like a star and a globe. Panels will disappear as the players die. > Rewards: > 2 of a person - find out who visited them > 3 of a person - find out their class type > 1 star - Heal you and make you death Immune for the night > 2 Stars - Anyone visiting to kill you will die for the night > 3 Stars - Gain 50 coins > 1 globe - Target a player and find out who they visited > 2 globes - Find out the # of house members > 3 globes - Instantly find out a house member
> ## [color=#1a88ba]The Doctor[/color] > **Female Gambler Support** > - Passive: Medical: Immune to poison and will live the first attack > > - Day: Injection: Inject a player with a medication making them immune to death tonight (3 uses) > > - Night: Heal: Heal a player >
> ## [color=#1a88ba]Tuitor[/color] > **Female Gambler Support** > - Passive: Helping: Start with 30 coins > > - Day: Give out: Give a player 5 coins (2 uses) > > - Day: Teaching: If a player is challenged to a game of poker or Texas holdem the next night you will help them. (Infinite) > > - Night: Discuss: Discuss with the player on what to do (infinite uses) (Only 3 messages) > > - Night: Observant: If a player cheats you will end the game of poker or Texas holdem (2 uses) [/details]
[details="Neutrals"] > ## [color=#5b6163]Darby[/color] > **Neutral Killer** > - Passive: Oasis: Everytime you are attacked, you will use a soul to heal yourself. Also when you beat a player in poker you will steal their soul (Start with 1 soul) > > - Day: Calm and rational: You can’t be targeted by a negative ability (negative abilities either don’t effect you or give feedback depending on what you say to the gm) (4 uses) > > - Day: Poker: Play poker with a player (infinite) > > - Night: Rigged since the start: Get a full house for your starting hand (counts as cheating) (3 uses) > > - Night: Readable: Be able to see 3 cards in a player’s hand (4 uses) (not counted as cheating)
> ## [color=#5b6163]Crazed Scientist[/color] > **Neutral Chaos** > - Passive: Scientist: Immune to poison > > - Day: Microbots: Infest your self with microbots making it so that you won’t die. (4 uses) > > - Night: Specimen: Select a specimen and preform the following: > > If your specimen is a house member or Darby you will become either a house scientist or a Pawn > > 1/10 - Swap the gender of the person (up to gm) > 1/10 - Kill the person > 1/10 - Make them luckier > 1/10 - Failed - They get 10 coins > 1/10 - Make them night Immune > 1/10 - Make them appear as evil > 1/10 - Make them receive no results from their actions for a night > 1/10 - They can target 2 players in a night for a night > 1/10 - Make them do what you say for a night > 1/10 - Make them omnipotent for the next day (Knows who uses a day action)
> ## [color=#5b6163]Pawn[/color] > **Neutral Loyal** > - Passive: Loyal: If Darby dies you die. > > - Day: Calm and rational: Anyone who uses a day ability on a person you select will instead use it on themselves. > > - Night: Willing to serve: If Darby is attacked you kill the attack bypassing night immunity (2 uses) > > - Night: Help: Help Darby win the game by rigging it (doesn’t count as cheating) (3 uses) [/details]
## Shop **Counterfeiter, House, Neutrals, and High Roller can't use the shop**
**1 coin - You get a sticker** **5 Stickers - █████**
**10 coins - You host a game of poker** **Limit = 2**
**30 coins - You get a piece of exodia** **5 pieces - █████**
**60 coins - Death Immune for a night** **Limit = 2**
**80 coins- Speak with the dead** **Limit = 1**
**100 coins = ███** **Limit = 1**
### Players 1. Light 2. Htm 3. Memesky 4. Maximus Prime 5. Firekitten 6. Sam 7. Poisoned 8. Livicus 9. Pug 10. Celeste 11. Hippo 12. 13. Marlixion 14. 15. 16. Eevee
